attributes.action: Investigate the roll of MI5 in the removal of Polititians from office that do not represent the establishments view
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC recently produced a more than credible documentary on the roll of our security services in removing Harold Wilson, a democratically elected prime minister from power. There seems to be control over other major politicians ever since including black propaganda for Prescott, and Mendleson. If we accept this, then democracy is even more of a joke than it ever should be. I urge the government to investigate MI5's role in his demise and the general effect that "le cercle" had on the politics of this nation in the 70's. By setting up an independent governing body to police the secret services role in control over democratically elected politicians.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
